activities:
Provide software as a service to business subscribers via charged and free trial accounts. 

When we use the term “personally identifiable information,” we mean information that is directly associated with, or could be used to identify, a specific person. Such information includes a name, address, telephone number, e mail address, or information about activities directly linked to that person which would permit the physical or online contacting of that person.
personaldata: On-line data, organizational and customer data, organization human resources data
recoursemech: Private sector developed dispute resolution mechanism through TRUSTe that incorporates the Safe Harbor framework.  We will cooperate and comply with the EU DPAs to investigate unresolved complaints involving organization human resources data.
